verses.name: Deuteronomy 12:22
verses.text: Even as the roebuck and the hart is eaten, so thou shalt eat them: the unclean and the clean shall eat of them alike.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 12:23
verses.text: Only be sure that thou eat not the blood: for the blood is the life; and thou mayest not eat the life with the flesh.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 12:24
verses.text: Thou shalt not eat it; thou shalt pour it upon the earth as water.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 12:25
verses.text: Thou shalt not eat it; that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee, when thou shalt do that which is right in the sight of the Lord.
